verses.verse: A prayer <WH8605> of Habakkuk <WH2265> the prophet <WH5030>, set to Shigionoth <WH7692>.

O Jehovah <WH3068>, I have heard <WH8085> the report <WH8088> of thee <WH3372>, and am afraid: O Jehovah <WH3068>, revive <WH2421> thy work <WH6467> in the midst <WH7130> of the years <WH8141>; In the midst <WH7130> of the years <WH8141> make it known <WH3045>; In wrath <WH7267> remember <WH2142> mercy <WH7355>.

God <WH433> came <WH935> from Teman <WH8487>, And the Holy One <WH6918> from mount <WH2022> Paran <WH6290>. Selah <WH5542>. His glory <WH1935> covered <WH3680> the heavens <WH8064>, And the earth <WH776> was full <WH4390> of his praise <WH8416>.
And his brightness <WH5051> was as the light <WH216>; He had rays <WH7161> coming forth from his hand <WH3027>; And there was the hiding <WH2253> of his power <WH5797>.
Before <WH6440> him went <WH3212> the pestilence <WH1698>, And fiery bolts <WH7565> went forth <WH3318> at his feet <WH7272>.

He stood <WH5975>, and measured <WH4128> the earth <WH776>; He beheld <WH7200>, and drove asunder <WH5425> the nations <WH1471>; And the eternal <WH5703> mountains <WH2042> were scattered <WH6327>; The everlasting <WH5703> hills <WH1389> did bow <WH7817>; His goings <WH5769> were as of old <WH5769>.
I saw <WH7200> the tents <WH168> of Cushan <WH3572> in affliction <WH205>; The curtains <WH3407> of the land <WH776> of Midian <WH4080> did tremble <WH7264>.

Was Jehovah <WH3068> displeased <WH2734> with the rivers <WH5104>? Was thine anger <WH639> against the rivers <WH5104>, Or thy wrath <WH5678> against the sea <WH3220>, That thou didst ride <WH7392> upon thy horses <WH5483>, Upon thy chariots <WH4818> of salvation <WH3444>?

Thy bow <WH7198> was made quite <WH6181> bare <WH5783>; The oaths <WH7621> to the tribes <WH4294> were a sure word <WH562>. Selah <WH5542>. Thou didst cleave <WH1234> the earth <WH776> with rivers <WH5104>.

The mountains <WH2022> saw <WH7200> thee <WH2342>, and were afraid; The tempest <WH2230> of waters <WH4325> passed by <WH5674>; The deep <WH8415> uttered <WH5414> its voice <WH6963>, And lifted up <WH5375> its hands <WH3027> on high <WH7315>.

The sun <WH8121> and moon <WH3394> stood still <WH5975> in their habitation <WH2073>, At the light <WH216> of thine arrows <WH2671> as they went <WH1980>, At the shining <WH5051> of thy glittering <WH1300> spear <WH2595>.
Thou didst march through <WH6805> the land <WH776> in indignation <WH2195>; Thou didst thresh <WH1758> the nations <WH1471> in anger <WH639>.

Thou wentest forth <WH3318> for the salvation <WH3468> of thy people <WH5971>, For the salvation <WH3468> of thine anointed <WH4899>; Thou woundest <WH4272> the head <WH7218> out of the house <WH1004> of the wicked <WH7563> man <WH6168>, Laying bare the foundation <WH3247> even unto the neck <WH6677>. Selah <WH5542>.

Thou didst pierce <WH5344> with his own staves <WH4294> the head <WH7218> of his warriors <WH6518>: They came as a whirlwind <WH5590> to scatter <WH6327> me <WH5951>; Their rejoicing was as to devour <WH398> the poor <WH6041> secretly <WH4565>.
Thou didst tread <WH1869> the sea <WH3220> with thy horses <WH5483>, The heap <WH2563> of mighty <WH7227> waters <WH4325>.

I heard <WH8085>, and my body <WH990> trembled <WH7264>, My lips <WH8193> quivered <WH6750> at the voice <WH6963>; Rottenness <WH7538> entereth <WH935> into my bones <WH6106>, and I tremble <WH7264> in my place <WH5117>; Because I must wait quietly for the day <WH3117> of trouble <WH6869>, For the coming up <WH5927> of the people <WH5971> that invadeth us <WH1464>.

For though the fig-tree <WH8384> shall not flourish <WH6524>, Neither shall fruit <WH2981> be in the vines <WH1612>; The labor <WH4639> of the olive <WH2132> shall fail <WH3584>, And the fields <WH7709> shall yield <WH6213> no food <WH400>; The flock <WH6629> shall be cut off <WH1504> from the fold <WH4356>, And there shall be no herd <WH1241> in the stalls <WH7517>:
Yet I will rejoice <WH5937> in Jehovah <WH3068>, I will joy <WH1523> in the God <WH430> of my salvation <WH3468>.
Jehovah <WH3069>, the Lord <WH136>, is my strength <WH2428>; And he maketh <WH7760> my feet <WH7272> like hinds <WH355>' feet <WH1869>, And will make me to walk upon my high places <WH1116>.
